features: 258 NEW STYLE GAMES: Our handheld game console built-in 258 games, includes educational puzzle, leisure, logic, adventure, racing games ect. It also comes with three 6-in-1 game cards. While kids enjoy the fun of the game, they're exercising their hand-eye coordination skills, thinking and problem solving skills.

STURDY & DROP-PROOF: Ergonomically and non-slip design, this elaborate retro game console has sensitive buttons. The shell is made of sturdy ABS plastic, which is strong enough to withstand daily drops after repeated tests and practical experience. It's a decent kids handheld video games.

3.0-IN LARGE SCREEN: 3.0 inch HD display, this retro handheld game console has clearer pictures, which can relieve eyes fatigue. Meanwhile, improving the stability of the game to avoid black screen. Coming with an AV output cable to connect the video game console to a TV, then the living room will immediately turn into a world of games, so children can have a great time at home.

PORTABLE HANDHELD GAMES: Built-in 1020mAh rechargeable battery, which allows you play while charging. No need to buy batteries frequently. After each fully charged, this handheld games for kids ages 4-8 can be played for 5-6 hours. Our handheld games is lightweight and portable, easy to carry on the go. When you are in the car, on business trips, long trips or camping, you don't have to worry about running out of power

SURPRISE GIFT FOR KIDS: This hand held video game with exquisite gift packaging, perfect as a Christmas, Birthday, Vacation Party gift for kids aged 4-12. You can also enjoy funny games with your honey together. If there is any problem with product or service, feel free to contact us. We are always here to provide professional solution for you.
body.description: Warm Tips: 1. Please fully charge the battery before first time use. 2. Please remove the battery from the device if you don't play for a long time. 3. The screen is covered with a protective film, which can be peeled off when you use the game console. 4. The game console does not have the function of saving game progress. 5. Before using game cards, please turn off the handheld game console first, then insert the game card into the card slot on the device. Please turn on the device, the game system will automatically read the games in the card box. 6. It may be the reason of a weak voltage if the screen is white, blurred and flash. In this case, please use our USB cable for charging. Turn on it after being fully charged.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Exquisite Christmas Gift for Children Adults Electronic Travel Handheld Games - Classic portable games console is a great gift for kids & adults on birthday, Christmas, New Year, Halloween, Thanksgiving, back to school.

GAMPLAE Handheld Video Game Playing is a child's nature, and nothing is better than a toy that keeps your child entertained. With elegant and stylish design, the handheld games is a a excelent Christmas/birthday gift for kids ages 4-8, 8-12, family and friends. The most important thing is that it can create happiness and memories for game lovers.

Support TV Output, Enjoy Big Screen Fun You can connect this retro handheld game console to the TV through 118inch AV data cable, so you can easily enjoy lively and exciting video games on the TV's big screen. Support Headphones This handheld gaming console comes with headphones, when put on the headphones, you can immerse yourself in the game world, and it also can avoid disturbing others. Note: Only use the headphones we are equipped with. Hidden Game Card Slot Design Our handheld game console comes with a hidden game card slot design that saves the space of the game console and makes it more elegant and more convenient. Three 6 IN 1 game cards include classic, puzzle and casual game themes. Compact size and lightweight, it is a ideal choice for playing in a car, on travel or on the go.

Warm Tips: 1. Please fully charge the battery before first time use. 2. Please remove the battery from the device if you don't play for a long time. 3. The screen is covered with a protective film, which can be peeled off when you use the game console. 4. The game console does not have the function of saving game progress. 5. Before using game cards, please turn off the handheld game console first, then insert the game card into the card slot on the device. Please turn on the device, the game system will automatically read the games in the card box. 6. It may be the reason of a weak voltage if the screen is white, blurred and flash. In this case, please use our USB cable for charging. Turn on it after being fully charged. Package Contains: 1 x Handheld Game Console 1 x Rechargeable Battery 1 x Earphone 1 x USB Type-C Cable 1 x AV Cable 1 x User Manual 3 x Game Cards Specially designed packaging gift box

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Christmas gift for the kid who has everything
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my 7 year old grandson. We had an early Christmas party on the 23rd. As the day was coming to a close and grandson was looking for some chill time, he played with this and enjoyed all of the old games. He tried several of the games and enjoyed them a lot. The unit was easy for him to handle and seemed to be sized just right.He already has a Nintendo switch, and I wasn't sure this unit would interest him, but there was a great assortment of games included with this unit, and he seemed absorbed by some of the old style games (Mario, anyone?).I looked over his shoulder for a few minutes and the screen seemed more than adequate for playing, and the response time was pretty good. All in all, I would recommend this console for someone who likes a variety of games, or the nostalgia of playing old games in a very portable device.

reviews.reviewText: Gave this to my son for his Birthday… and it won’t work, sent an email to the company and they are replacing it with no problem!! It was over my return date too!! Great company and my son will love playing with his new game console!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Purchased this for my grandchildren. I spent a couple evenings trying to figure it out. I am not real game savvy but this was hard to follow. There is no directions, you don't know what the object of each game is. The game just starts and you have to figure it out. I put it away, not sure but I think it will just frustrate them. The grandkids are ages 7, 5 & 4. I think I will wait till the snow falls and we need a project. It is hand size and easy to hold and push the buttons. I probably should have returned it.
